document_name: UNDP Ghana ODS Destruction Proposal - Draft 6 - 4 Mar 2010 (2).docx
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/GHA/00061984/UNDP Ghana ODS Destruction Proposal - Draft 6 - 4 Mar 2010 (2).docx

outputs.output_descr:
The project seeks to demonstrate the viability or otherwise of a national management and ODS disposal facility, noting that this is part of a larger strategic approach by UNDP to demonstrate a range of options in the projects it is currently assembling for a range of country specific situations.
•	ODS waste from Ghana will be exported. If found feasible, ODS waste from the neighbouri9ng ECOWAS countries will be contemplated as well. The risks and barriers (economic, legal, Basel and Rotterdam conventions stipulates, etc.) for such interventions will be identified and means for mitigation will be formulated.
•	It also seeks to develop an efficient and cost effective logistic framework for the transport, storage and shipment of ODS in Ghana.

project_title: PILOT DEMONSTRATION PROJECT ON ODS WASTE MANAGEMENT
